WorkItem.Description: Error	3	The tag 'VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups' does not exist in XML namespace 'clr-namespace:System.Windows;assembly=WPFToolkit'. Line 175 Position 26.	C:\Downloads\wpfthemes-15806\WPF.Themes\DavesGlossyControls\Theme.xaml	175	26	WPF.Themes

Comments.Message:
You can replace
xmlns:vsm="clr-namespace:System.Windows;assembly=WPFToolkit"   with
xmlns:vsm="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wpf/2008/toolkit"

and then remove all of the 'vsm:' tags and everything should work.

Use ctrl+h for a quick way to replace the above strings in all of the files in the solution ... be sure to choose look in: entire solution.
Have you installed the WPF Toolkit? Which version? Is it refrenced?

This solution technically worked because I can now build and run my applications BUT when I load my forms at design time the Design window reports "Problem Loading The document contains errors that must be fixed..."
